column4: Hi i have a apache2 server error, i restarted it Could not determine the server's fully qualified domain name. Anyone got a sggestion howto fix?
that's a warning, not an error
when i try to access it via my network connected laptop it doesnt show anything.. which might thing hold on
it isn't a big deal, but if you want it to go away, you have to specify a ServerName directive in your httpd.conf
